Nerangs.ab: rāspīg pad gāh ī ātrawaxšān vahištąm aṣ̌īm aōgəmadaēca usmahica vīsāmadaēca aməṣ̌anąm spəṇtanąm yasnāica vaɱāica xšnaōϑrāica frasastaiiaēca raϑβō bərəzatō yō aṣ̌ahe raϑβąm aiiaranąm asńiianąmca māhiianąmca yāiriianąmca sarəδanąmca yōi həṇti aṣ̌ahe ratauuō hāuuanōiš raθβō yasnāica vaɱāica xšnaōϑrāica frasastaiiaēca ahurahe mazdā̊ raēuuatō xᵛarənaŋᵛhatō aməṣ̌anąm spəṇtanąm xšnūman kē bēd guftan tā xšnaōθra yasnāica vaɱāica xšnaōϑrāica frasastaiiaēca frasastaiiaēca agar gāhānbār bēd raϑβō bərəzatō tā sarəδanąmca yōi həṇti aṣ̌ahe ratauuō maiδiiōizarəmaiiehe raϑβō ayāb ān gāh ī bēd yasnāica vaɱāica xšnaōϑrāica frasastaiiaēca raϑβō bərəzatō tā sarəδanąm raϑβąm vīspe mazištanąm yōi həṇti aṣ̌ahe ratauuō hāuuanīm paiti ratūm maiδiiōizarəmaiiehe raϑβō ayāb ān gāh ī bēd xšnaōθra yasnāica vaɱāica xšnaōϑrāica frasastaiiaēca frasastaiiaēca.

"The rāspīg (should recite) at the place of the ātrawaxšān: vahištąm aṣ̌īm aōgəmadaēca usmahica vīsāmadaēca (He should continue with) aməṣ̌anąm spəṇtanąm yasnāica vaɱāica xšnaōϑrāica frasastaiiaēca raϑβō bərəzatō yō aṣ̌ahe raϑβąm aiiaranąm asńiianąmca māhiianąmca yāiriianąmca sarəδanąmca yōi həṇti aṣ̌ahe ratauuō hāuuanōiš raθβō yasnāica vaɱāica xšnaōϑrāica frasastaiiaēca ahurahe mazdā̊ raēuuatō xᵛarənaŋᵛhatō aməṣ̌anąm spəṇtanąmand the corresponding šnūman until xšnaōθra yasnāica vaɱāica xšnaōϑrāica frasastaiiaēca frasastaiiaēca. If it is a (liturgy for) Gāhānbār, (he should recite): raϑβō bərəzatō until sarəδanąmca yōi həṇti aṣ̌ahe ratauuō maiδiiōizarəmaiiehe raϑβō or the corresponding gāh (and continue with) yasnāica vaɱāica xšnaōϑrāica frasastaiiaēca raϑβō bərəzatō until sarəδanąm raϑβąm vīspe mazištanąm yōi həṇti aṣ̌ahe ratauuō hāuuanīm paiti ratūm maiδiiōizarəmaiiehe raϑβō or the corresponding gāh (and continue with) xšnaōθra yasnāica vaɱāica xšnaōϑrāica frasastaiiaēca frasastaiiaēca."
